text: Henry Souza (12 July 1921 - 8 May 1975) was a Hong Kong sports shooter. He competed at the 1960 Summer Olympics, the 1964 Summer Olympics and 1958 and 1966 Asian Games. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:1975 deaths Category:Hong Kong male sport shooters Category:Olympic shooters of Hong Kong Category:Shooters at the 1960 Summer Olympics Category:Shooters at the 1964 Summer Olympics Category:Asian Games medalists in shooting Category:Shooters at the 1958 Asian Games Category:Shooters at the 1966 Asian Games Category:Hong Kong emigrants to Canada Category:Asian Games bronze medalists for Hong Kong Category:Medalists at the 1958 Asian Games
title: Henry Souza
